Member Function Documentation

actionAuthenticate (  ) 

authenticate an active user

Parameters:
user - the username
pass - the password
Returns:
returns a valid user object and sets the session variable +pvd_user_id+, or null if authentication fails

Reimplemented in DTSecureAuthenticationProvider.

actionPasswordResetToken (  ) 

request a password reset token (no session required)

Parameters:
alias - the user to request a reset for
Returns:
returns a valid DTResetToken
actionResetPassword (  ) 

reset a password

Parameters:
alias - the user to reset password for
